| History                 = 

[[Thoth-Amon (Earth-616)|Thoth-Amon]] has at times served as the de facto master of the organization, though certain members disdain his dominance.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #206}}

In one of the last known confrontations between Thoth-Amon and [[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]], King of [[Aquilonia]], the entire Ring gathered to face the forces of Aquilonia. All but Thoth-Amon were supposedly slain.{{r|King Conan #2}}
